snippet: Even as the “Made in the U.S.A.” label has grown scarce, it has acquired cachet as a signifier of old-school craftsmanship, even luxury.
abstract: 'Made in the USA' label--now a rarity due to offshore manufacturing in apparel--has acquired cachet as a signifier of craftsmanship and even luxury; Made, a new company that both sells American-made goods online and helps other companies that only manufacture in America advertise, is seeking to capitalize on this growing trend.
lead_paragraph: Even as the “Made in the U.S.A.” label has grown scarce, it has acquired cachet as a signifier of old-school craftsmanship, even luxury.

headline.seo: ‘Made in the U.S.A.’ Has a New Meaning
headline.main: A Label That Has Regained Its Luster
headline.print_headline: A Label That Has Regained Its Luster
